item.title: Shops for 508
item.dc:creator: @bite_the_man bite the man
item.description:
@bite_the_man wrote:

it usually depends on what source ur useing.

ex paladino shop handleing in npc option 2 is

case 1658: // Npc id (shop2-magic) Engine.shopHandler.openshop(p, 5); break;

this one you need to modify for what shop u got (if its not a magic store change it)

or in another source

if(pnp.npcType == NPC) { p.viewings = 1; p.shopid = 11; p.frames.showInterface(p, 278); p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop11, p.shop11n); p.frames.setString(p, " Summoning Shop", 278, 88); }

put the id of the npc you are useing in for NPC

i guess more info after you try some stuff would be good.

Read full topic

item.title: Shops for 508
item.dc:creator: @client_class client class
item.description:
@client_class wrote:

I add it correctly, but whenever I trade the guy it always DC’s me and in my run.bat it says [blood] Unhandled NPC option 2: 34

This is my code in NPCOption2:

                case 34:
		p.viewings = 1;
		p.shopid = 2;
		p.getActionSender().showInterface(p, 278);
		p.getActionSender().setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop2, p.shop2n);
		p.getActionSender().setString(p, "Bob's Starter Shop", 278, 88);
			break;

I know how to make shops, but this source had none in it…

Read full topic
